abstract.p: The present procedure for reporting bugs in the Starlink Software Collection is thought by many to be unsatisfactory. The purpose of this document is to outline the procedures to be followed by the person discovering the bug, the Starlink Software Librarian and the person to whom the bug is reported. In the past, bug reports have seemed to disappear down a black hole, with a fix (maybe) appearing, without warning, sometime later. This was generally due to a lack of communication on all parts and it is hoped that the procedures outlined below will keep all users informed of the progress of a bug through the system.
